desc: Introduce your students to a new generation of Shelly Cashman Series books! For the past three decades, the Shelly Cashman Series has effectively introduced computer skills to millions of students. With HTML: Comprehensive Concepts and Techniques, Fifth Edition, we’re continuing our history of innovation by enhancing our proven pedagogy to reflect the learning styles of today’s students. Within this text you will find features that are specifically designed to engage students, improve retention, and prepare them for future success.

details.authors: Denise M. Woods, William J. Dorin

title: HTML: Comprehensive Concepts and Techniques (Available Titles Skills Assessment Manager (SAM) – Office 2010)
